block.p: KAVESH-Lily. Beloved wife of the late Robert. Devoted mother of Susan and Norman Bank and Frances and Harry Levine. Cherished grandmother of Stefanie and Evan Bower, Jamie and Michael Trompeter, Sandra and Bill Charlap and David and Marcy Levine. Great-grandmother of Jared, Ross, Julia, Sophie, Vivian and Benjamin. Services Sunday 1:15 PM at ''the Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Ave.
